alert.note: Alert for South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 1:44PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pima and south central Pinal Counties through 230 PM MST... At 142 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Picacho Peak State Park, or 20 miles northwest of Marana, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Dust could create visibilities reductions along Interstate 10 between Tucson and Phoenix. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eloy, Avra Valley, Picacho, Picacho Peak State Park and Red Rock. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 206 and 233. Route 87 between mile markers 116 and 124. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail
